title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Manage multicloud Kubernetes at scale feat. Adobe (HMC322)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 大规模管理多云 Kubernetes，Adobe 实践分享 (HMC322)
abstract: Organizations often adopt a multicloud container strategy to meet latency, regulatory, and customer requirements. Adobe operates 500+ clusters across multicloud and on-premises environments, powering 4,000+ production services. In this session, we dive deep into Adobe's journey with fleet management of their multicloud Kubernetes clusters. Learn how Adobe solved challenges such as standardization of cluster lifecycle management, inter-cluster networking, security policies, and multi-tenancy across cloud providers. Adobe will share their approach, design patterns, and practices based on a declarative, GitOps-based solution with Cluster API and Argo, tenant isolation with Open Policy Agent (OPA), and fleet-wide optimization techniques.
abstract_cn: 企业通常采用多云容器策略来满足延迟、合规性和客户需求。Adobe 在多云和本地环境中运营着 500 多个集群，为 4,000 多个生产服务提供支持。在本次会议中，我们将深入探讨 Adobe 在多云 Kubernetes 集群车队管理方面的实践历程。了解 Adobe 如何解决集群生命周期管理标准化、跨集群网络、安全策略以及跨云提供商多租户等挑战。Adobe 将分享他们基于 Cluster API 和 Argo 的声明式 GitOps 解决方案、使用 Open Policy Agent (OPA) 实现租户隔离以及车队级优化技术的方法、设计模式和实践。
